bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition of drum-like distension brought forth by cold. Shi liao ben cao 食療本草 Substance Entry wei rou 蝟肉： 此豬多食苦參，不理冷脹，只理熱風水脹 , “These pigs eat much ku shen .[Hence their meat] is not capable of regulating cold distension ; it is able only to regulate distensions because of heat, wind, and water”.

② Illness Sign of a distension that develops accompanied by a feeling of cold or cold. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 4: qin di li 秦荻梨：主心腹冷脹 , “Controls cold distension of the heart and abdominal region”.
